laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple new intra-pelvic fluid collections, the largest measuring 8.0 x 7.5 x 4.7 cm; another fluid collection measuring 6.3 cm x 3.6 cm x 5.8 cm. No extraluminal contrast. Increased number of mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes, prominent inguinal lymph nodes have slightly increased in size.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared to the prior study, increased number of lymph nodes and new intra-pelvic fluid collections noted.
